data.name: Flashback 2
data.detailed_description:
30 YEARS LATER, THE RETURN OF A LEGENDARY FRANCHISE

The acclaimed sci-fi side-scroller that became a retro gaming classic returns, with modern graphics and gameplay!
After overcoming the Death Tower, Conrad and his allies must once again face the Morphs, the alien race that threatens all civilizations. Moreover, his friend Ian got abducted and to get answers Conrad has to find him… Are the Morphs behind this disappearance? But why? You will have to find out…
Unveil a nefarious plot and save the solar system!

Features:

  • Rediscover the world and characters of the iconic sci-fi series
  • Make your way through 5 action-packed levels in varied environments (Jungle, City, Factory, Spaceship…)
  • Use your wits, weapons and skills to take down your foes
  • Hide in the shadows to avoid enemies… or to eliminate them.
  • Take control of an overpowered Mecha
  • Ride your Jet Bike to travel between key places
  • Use the inventory system to customize and upgrade your equipment: grenade, shields, stealth device…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2120 @ 3.3 GHz, AMD FX 4100 @ 3.6Gh
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960, AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Sound Card: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690 @ 3.5 GHz, AMD FX 9370 @ 4.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060, Radeon RX 480
  • Sound Card: Version 11
